Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local OldAxe = Tool.Handle
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local myCharacter = Tool.Parent local myHumanoid local myPlayer local Torso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Torso or not myHumanoid then script:Remove() end local TorsoFrame if Torso then TorsoFrame = Torso.CFrame else TorsoFrame = CFrame.new() end -- Re-checking for Torso just avoids an error message.
local LookVector = TorsoFrame.lookVector.unit LookVector = (myHumanoid.TargetPoint - OldAxe.Position).unit
local Rotator local AxeHandle local HandleWeld local AxeBack local BackWeld local AxeBlade local BladeWeld local totalMass
local AntiGrav local Force local AngularVelocity
local SoundScript
local HitWeld
local WOOD_DAMAGE = 9 -- Low damage is because spinning weapons ==> many, many hits. local BLADE_DAMAGE = 17
-- Set up the axe's parts :(
Rotator = Instance.new("Part") Rotator.Name = "Pirate Axe Rotator" Rotator.CanCollide = false Rotator.Locked = true Rotator.formFactor = 3 -- Custom Rotator.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Rotator.Transparency = 1.0 Rotator.CFrame = TorsoFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, math.pi) + Vector3.new(-1.52 * LookVector.Z, 1.62, 1.52 * LookVector.X - 0.75) + LookVector Rotator.Parent = game.Workspace
AxeHandle = OldAxe:Clone() AxeHandle.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 1.8) AxeHandle.Transparency = 0.0 AxeHandle.Name = "Pirate Axe Handle" AxeHandle.Parent = game.Workspace AxeHandle.CFrame = Rotator.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, -0.32, 0.75) AxeHandle.Material = "Wood"
HandleWeld = Instance.new("Weld") HandleWeld.Name = "Pirate Axe Handle Weld" HandleWeld.Part1 = AxeHandle HandleWeld.Part0 = Rotator HandleWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -0.32, 0.75) HandleWeld.Parent = game.Workspace
AxeBack = Instance.new("Part") AxeBack.Name = "Pirate Axe Back" AxeBack.Locked = true AxeBack.formFactor = 3 --Custom AxeBack.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.6, 1.1) AxeBack.Transparency = 1.0 AxeBack.CFrame = Rotator.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, -0.6, -0.1) AxeBack.Material = "Wood" AxeBack.Parent = game.Workspace
BackWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BackWeld.Part1 = AxeBack BackWeld.Part0 = Rotator BackWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, -0.6, -0.1) BackWeld.Name = "Pirate Axe Back Weld" BackWeld.Parent = game.Workspace
AxeBlade = Instance.new("Part") AxeBlade.Name = "Pirate Axe Blade" AxeBlade.CanCollide = false AxeBlade.Locked = true AxeBlade.formFactor = 3 -- Custom AxeBlade.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.45, 1.3) AxeBlade.Material = "Corroded Metal" AxeBlade.Transparency = 1.0 AxeBlade.CFrame = Rotator.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 0.3, 0) AxeBlade.Parent = game.Workspace
BladeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") BladeWeld.Part1 = AxeBlade BladeWeld.Part0 = Rotator BladeWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0.3, 0) BladeWeld.Name = "Pirate Axe Blade Weld" BladeWeld.Parent = game.Workspace
totalMass = Rotator:GetMass() + AxeHandle:GetMass() + AxeBack:GetMass() + AxeBlade:GetMass()
AntiGrav = Instance.new("BodyForce") AntiGrav.force = Vector3.new(0, totalMass * 196.2, 0)
-- Functions and connections:
function tagAndUntagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local CreatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorTag.Name = "creator" CreatorTag.Value = player CreatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(CreatorTag, 1) end
function blow(hit, damage) local otherCharacter = hit.Parent myCharacter = Tool.Parent if not myCharacter or not otherCharacter then return end if otherCharacter ~= myCharacter and otherCharacter ~= Tool then if hit.CanCollide then Force.Parent = nil -- Stop the axe from flying if (1) it hit a CanCollide true object, or AngularVelocity.Parent = nil if SoundScript then SoundScript:Remove() end end myPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(myCharacter) local otherHumanoid = otherCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid and otherHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= otherHumanoid then Force.Parent = nil -- (2) it hit a person. AngularVelocity.Parent = nil if SoundScript then SoundScript:Remove() end tagAndUntagHumanoid(otherHumanoid, myPlayer) otherHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function woodBlow(hit) blow(hit, WOOD_DAMAGE) end
function bladeBlow(hit) blow(hit, BLADE_DAMAGE) end
function impact(hit) local hitThing = hit.Parent myCharacter = Tool.Parent -- As with blow, we only hit objects that aren't us, aren't the axe, and either are CanCollide true -- or are parts of other characters. -- This function is connected to a hit on Rotator, rather than just on AxeBlade, to ensure that the axe is -- deep inside something before it sticks. if hitThing ~= myCharacter and hitThing ~= Tool and (hit.CanCollide or hitThing:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")) then Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Name = "Pirate Axe Hit Weld" Weld.Part0 = hit Weld.Part1 = Rotator Weld.C1 = Rotator.CFrame:inverse() * hit.CFrame Weld.Parent = game.Workspace
Force.Parent = nil AngularVelocity.Parent = nil if SoundScript then SoundScript:Remove() end end end
AxeHandle.Touched:connect(woodBlow) AxeBack.Touched:connect(woodBlow) AxeBlade.Touched:connect(bladeBlow) Rotator.Touched:connect(impact)
-- Whew! Now to get to the things that actually do stuff.
Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.Name = "Pirate Axe Force" Force.force = AntiGrav.force + LookVector * totalMass * 800 Force.Parent = Rotator
AngularVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") AngularVelocity.Name = "Pirate Axe Ang. Vel." AngularVelocity.angularvelocity = 30 * Vector3.new(LookVector.Z, 0, -LookVector.X) AngularVelocity.P = 100 AngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(100, 100, 100) AngularVelocity.Parent = Rotator
debris:AddItem(Rotator, 10) debris:AddItem(AxeHandle, 10) debris:AddItem(AxeBack, 10) debris:AddItem(AxeBlade, 10) debris:AddItem(script, 10)
SoundScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("SoundScript") if SoundScript then SoundScript = SoundScript:Clone() SoundScript.Parent = Rotator SoundScript.Disabled = false end
wait(0.1)
Force.force = AntiGrav.force

local Tool = script.Parent local Axe = Tool.Handle
local ThrowAnim
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = Tool UnsheathSound.Volume = 0.5
local ProjectileScript
local myCharacter local myHumanoid
function onActivated() myCharacter = Tool.Parent if not myCharacter then return end myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myHumanoid then return end
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
ThrowAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("AxeThrow")) if ThrowAnim then ThrowAnim:Play() end
-- Standard projectile weapon approach: make current handle invisible, create -- a cloned one, and send it flying in a separate, serverside script. wait(0.65) Axe.Transparency = 1.0 ProjectileScript = Tool:FindFirstChild("PirateAxe Projectile Script") if ProjectileScript then ProjectileScript = ProjectileScript:Clone() ProjectileScript.Parent = Tool ProjectileScript.Disabled = false end wait(1) Axe.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() if UnsheathSound then UnsheathSound:Play() end end
function onUnequipped() if ThrowAnim then ThrowAnim:Stop() end if UnsheathSound then UnsheathSound:Stop() end
Axe.Transparency = 0.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
-- Changing Tool.Enabled to deal with the possibility of the character's backspacing the tool -- while it's disabled. if not Tool.Enabled then wait(1) Tool.Enabled = true end

local WhooshSound = Instance.new("Sound") WhooshSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=55634401" WhooshSound.Parent = script.Parent
for i = 1, 50 do WhooshSound:Play() wait(0.2) end
script:Remove()
